body: In the midst of a severe crisis, the president of the University of Puerto Rico, José Ramón de la Torre, resigned allegedly due to "personal reasons." The student digital publication Desde Adentro/Rojo Gallito informs [es] that De la Torre resigned one day after sending the Police Superintendent, José Figueroa Sancha, a letter requesting the immediate exit of the the Police from the Río Piedras campus.
original_body: In the midst of a severe crisis, the president of the University of Puerto Rico, José Ramón de la Torre, resigned allegedly due to "personal reasons." The student digital publication Desde Adentro/Rojo Gallito informs [es] that De la Torre resigned one day after sending the Police Superintendent, José Figueroa Sancha, a letter requesting the immediate exit of the the Police from the Río Piedras campus.
title: Puerto Rico: UPR President Resigns

sentence: In the midst of a severe crisis, the president of the University of Puerto Rico, José Ramón de la Torre, resigned allegedly due to "personal reasons."

The student digital publication Desde Adentro/Rojo Gallito informs [es] that De la Torre resigned one day after sending the Police Superintendent, José Figueroa Sancha, a letter requesting the immediate exit of the the Police from the Río Piedras campus.
